name="ページ1" id="JFECwEL1uDYYFKoyOX9N"> <mxGraphModel dx="2403" dy="965" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-1" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="3370" width="740" x="-720" y="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-55" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#000000;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;spacing=20;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" value="<div style="line-height: 140%;">↓getBooksリゾルバに渡ってくるparent<div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="color: rgb(179, 179, 179); line-height: 140%;">undefined</span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><font color="#b3b3b3"><span style="caret-color: rgb(179, 179, 179);"><br></span></font><div style="line-height: 140%;">↓Bookのidリゾルバに渡ってくるparent<br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">{ id: "1", title: "グレートギャッツビー"}</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 140%;">↓Bookのtitleリゾルバに渡ってくるparent</div></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">{ id: "1", title: "グレートギャッツビー"}<br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><div style="line-height: 140%;"><div style="line-height: 140%;">↓Bookのidリゾルバに渡ってくるparent<br></div><div style="line-height: 140%;">{ id: "2", title: "動物農場"}</div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 140%;">↓Bookのtitleリゾルバに渡ってくるparent</div></div><div style="line-height: 140%;">{ id: "2", title: "動物農場"}</div></div><div></div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="410" width="660" x="-680" y="2130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-62" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#B266FF;strokeWidth=2;fontColor=#CC99FF;dashed=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="61" width="358" x="-673" y="2149" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-18" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1" value="リゾルバ関数の引数<div>第1引数: parent</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="222.62" x="-461.30999999999995" y="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-49" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#000000;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;spacing=10;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" value="<div>import { <span style="">ApolloServer</span> } from "@apollo/server";</div><div>import { startStandaloneServer } from "@apollo/server/standalone";</div><div><br></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//スキーマ定義</span></div><span style="">const</span> <span style="">typeDefs</span> = <span style="">`#graphql</span><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	type Book {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id: ID!</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	title: String</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	type Query {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getBooks: [Book]</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span><div><span style="">`;</span></div><div><span style=""><br></span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//DBデータの代わり</span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="line-height: 140%;">const books = [</span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;">	{ <span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//Book1</span></span></span></div><div><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id: "1",</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	title: "グレートギャッツビー"</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></span></div><div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	{ <span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//Book2</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">		id: "2",<br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">		title: "動物農場"<br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	}</span></div></div><div><span style="">];</span></div><div><br></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//リゾルバ定義</span></div><div><span style="">const</span> <span style="">resolvers</span> = {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	Query: {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 102);">getBooks</span>: (<span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">parent</span>) =&gt; {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log("↓getBookByID</span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">リゾルバ</span><span style="white-space: pre;">に渡ってくるparent")</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log(<span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">parent</span>);</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return books</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">;</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	Book: {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 102);">id</span>: (<span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">parent</span>) =&gt; {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>console.log("↓Bookのid</span><span style="white-space: pre;">リゾルバ</span><span style="white-space: pre;">に渡ってくるparent")</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>console.log(<span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">parent</span>)</span><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return parent.id;</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 102);">title</span>: (<span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">parent</span>) =&gt; {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>console.log("↓Bookのtitleリゾルバに渡ってくるparent")</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log(<span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">parent</span>)</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return parent.title</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div>};</div><div><br></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//GraphQLサーバー作成</span></div><div><span style="">const</span> <span style="">server</span> = <span style="">new</span> <span style="">ApolloServer</span>({</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	typeDefs,</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	resolvers</span><br></span></div><div>});</div><div><br></div></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//htttpサーバーを起動(GraphQLサーバーをミドルウェアみたいに渡す)</span></div><div>const { url } = await startStandaloneServer(</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	server,</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>{</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	listen: { port: 4000 }</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span></div><div>);</div><div><br></div><div>console.log(url);</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="1580" width="660" x="-680" y="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-50" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;" value="以下のコードを用意してみた" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="260" x="-680" y="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-51" parent="1" x="-680" y="1850" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-52" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#000000;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;spacing=10;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" value="<div style="line-height: 140%;">query 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 140%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 140%;">	id</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span 140%;">	title</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 140%;">	</span>}</span><br><div style="line-height: 140%;">}</div></div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="180" width="660" x="-680" y="1880" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="410" x="-680" y="2100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-56" parent="1" 140%;">{</div><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><div style="line-height: 140%;">"data": {</div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	"getBooks": [</span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	{</span></span></div><div pre;">	"id": "1",</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	"title": "グレートギャッビー"</span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	{</span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	"id": "2",</span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span "動物農場"</span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>]</span><br></div></blockquote><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</div><div style="line-height: 140%;">}</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry
